name: Indyeva Pania Full Zip Hoodie - Women's
description:
Fleece and elegance united like never before. This hooded sryle works as a cowl when worn down and is roomy enough not to flatten your hair when worn up. Shaped edges and curved seams give it a signature modern look.Polartec Thermal Pro fleece has a heathered surface and a moisture wicking finish.Polyester fabric contains 77% recycled content.2-way YKK® Metaluxe® zipper has a removable leather pull.Hand pockets.Shaped cuffs cover the backs of your hands.Length in front is 26.5 inches, plus 1 inch in the back.

        Sustainability
